abilities.name: ravenous flock
abilities.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and restore his mana. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: death's hand
abilities.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies hit and stop on impact with enemy champions. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

abilities.name: vision of empire
abilities.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: nevermove
abilities.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

abilities.name: demonic ascension
abilities.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to deal damage equal to the amount of health he drained, ending his transformation to decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.
